actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of service on the National Guard (including Technician service) for purposes of civil service retirement.

summary.text: Defines the term "military service" for the purpose of civil service retirement to include active duty for training in the National Guard while receiving Federal pay and allowances, whether in the course of active duty in the service of the United States or otherwise. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331(13)) Provides for crediting service under the Civil Service Retirement Act for service by National Guard technicians. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332(b), 8334(c), 8339(e))

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of service on the National Guard (including Technician service) for purposes of civil service retirement.
